package.name: musl
package.build:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} for f in utmp paths ; do sed -i 's%/dev/null/wtmp%/var/log/wtmp%g' include/${f}.h sed -i 's%/dev/null/utmp%/var/run/utmp%g' include/${f}.h done
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-ia32-musl/bin:$PATH export CLFS_HOST=$(echo ${MACHTYPE} | sed "s/-[^-]*/-cross/") export CLFS_TARGET=i386-linux-musl export CLFS_CPU=i686
CFLAGS=-fno-toplevel-reorder \ CC=${CLFS_TARGET}-gcc \ ./configure \ --prefix=/ \ --target=${CLFS_TARGET} CFLAGS=-fno-toplevel-reorder CC=${CLFS_TARGET}-gcc make
